QuestData.Title: Meeting Kalecgos
QuestData.Description:
I fear we will have to split our attention. The Primalist threat to the east must be handled.
I must ask you travel to the Azure Archives in my stead to aid Kalecgos in reclaiming the Azure Oathstone.
You'll need to pick up a few supplies to help you with whatever is happening there.
Speak with our portal quartermaster, they ought to have something that can aid you along the way.
Good luck, $n. Kalecgos will appreciate the aid.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get the Bag of Helpful Goods, then meet Kalecgos at the base of the Azure Archives.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Kalecgos at the base of the Azure Archives.
QuestData.RewardText:
Khadgar is wise to redirect his efforts towards the Primalists.
But now... we've got a lot of work to do here.
